update t_xfxx
CREATETIME = #{CREATETIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},

update t_xfxx set CREATETIME = #{CREATETIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATETIME = #{UPDATETIME,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, XFMC = #{XFMC,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XFSH = #{XFSH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XFYHZH = #{XFYHZH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, XFDZDH = #{XFDZDH,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, terminalCode = #{terminalCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, appId = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, authorizationCode = #{authorizationCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, requestCode = #{requestCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sigCode = #{sigCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, fjh = #{fjh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, jqbh = #{jqbh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, serverUrl = #{serverUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BY1 = #{BY1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BY2 = #{BY2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BY3 = #{BY3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where UUID = #{UUID,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select x.UUID,XFMC, XFSH, XFYHZH, XFDZDH, p.BY1 KPR,p.SKR,p.FHR,p.CXJE,p.CFYJ from t_xfxx x, t_peizhi p where x.BY1 = p.UUID AND XFSH = #{xfsh,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
